suggestions: Specify the actual amounts for M, X, and Y to provide clarity.
Include provisions for what constitutes a default and the specific legal actions that may be taken.
Add a section on the timeline for issuing the bond and disbursing funds.
Consider including a more detailed list of eligible projects or a criteria for project approval to avoid ambiguity.
Discuss potential contingencies for project delays or cost overruns.
Clarify the expected outcomes of the stormwater management projects to provide measurable goals.
Include a statement regarding community engagement or input in project selection.

issues: Lack of specific financial details (M, X, Y) could lead to misunderstandings.
Absence of a contingency plan for project delays or budget overruns.
No mention of how compliance with local regulations and standards will be verified.
input.original_headline: City Council approves M stormwater bond
